mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airport (id, airport_code, airport_name, city_name, latitude_coordinate, longitude_coordinate, timezone) VALUES (#{model.airportID}, #{model.airportCode}, #{model.airportName}, #{model.city}, #{model.latitude}, #{model.longitude}, #{model.timezone})
mapper.select: SELECT id, airport_code, airport_name, city_name, latitude_coordinate, longitude_coordinate, timezone FROM airport WHERE id = #{id}
